00051 RemotePropertyManager::RemotePropertyManager(Repository* repository) : repository(repository), exiting(false)
00052 { }
00053 
00054 bool RemotePropertyManager::init()
00055 {
00056     return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 bool RemotePropertyManager::start()
00060 {
00061     if (!createThread(&receiverThreadId, (void*(*)(void*))receiverThreadFn, this,
00062         "property updates receiver thread")) return false;
00063     if (!createThread(&periodicSenderThreadId, (void*(*)(void*))periodicSenderThreadFn, this,
00064         "property updates periodic sender thread")) return false;
00065     if (!createThread(&periodicUdpRenewalThreadId, (void*(*)(void*))periodicUdpRenewalThreadFn, this,
00066         "property updates periodic UDP subscriptions renewal thread")) return false;
00067     return true;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void RemotePropertyManager::receiver()
00071 {
00072     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("Property updates receiver started");
00073 
00074     receiverSession = repository->createSession("propertyReceiver",
00075         "Property updates receiver session", "/");
00076     Session* session = receiverSession; // just a shortcut
00077 
00078     SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00079     session->queueSubscribe(PROPERTY_INBOX);
00080     session->queueSetInterests(PROPERTY_INBOX, new RemotePropertyManagerInterests);
00081     session->listen(PROPERTY_INBOX);
00082     SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00083 
00084     while (session->wait(), !exiting) {
00085         try {
00086             session->start();
00087             vector<const RDK2::Object*> objects = session->queueFreeze(PROPERTY_INBOX);
00088             DOUT("Inbox contains %d messages", objects.size());
00089             for (vector<const RDK2::Object*>::iterator it = objects.begin();
00090             it != objects.end(); ++it) {
00091                 try {
00092                     const RNetMessage* msg = dynamic_cast<const RNetMessage*>(*it);
00093                     if (!msg) {
00094                         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Found something weird in the inbox (class: '%s')",
00095                             (*it)->getClassName().c_str());
00096                     }
00097                     else {
00098                         if (msg->getType() == RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE) {
00099                             manageUpdateMessage(msg);
00100                         }
00101                         else if (msg->getType() == RNetMessage::PROPERTY_SUBSCRIPTION) {
00102                             manageSubscriptionMessage(msg);
00103                         }
00104                     }
00105                 }
00106                 catch (const SessionException& e) {
00107                     RDK_ERROR_PRINTF(e.what());
00108                 }
00109             }
00110             session->end();
00111         }
00112         catch (SessionException& exc) {
00113             session->terminate();
00114             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Failure while taking inbox: " << exc.what());
00115             sleep(1);
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00120     session->queueUnsubscribe(PROPERTY_INBOX);
00121     SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00122 }
00123 
00124 void RemotePropertyManager::manageUpdateMessage(const RNetMessage* msg) throw (SessionException)
00125 {
00126     const RPropertyUpdate* pu = dynamic_cast<const RPropertyUpdate*>(msg->getPayload());
00127     if (!pu) {
00128         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("There wasn't a property update in the message "
00129             "(class: '%s')", msg->getPayload()->getClassName().c_str());
00130     }
00131     else {
00132         if (!pu->completeUrl.isComplete()) {
00133             RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Url of property is not complete (%s)", pu->completeUrl.c_str());
00134         }
00135         else {
00136             DOUT("Managing update message for property '%s'", pu->completeUrl.c_str());
00137             switch (pu->type) {
00138                 case RPropertyUpdate::VALUE: {
00139                     //RDK2::Object* obj = pu->object->clone();
00140 /*                  RPoint2od* p2 = dynamic_cast<RPoint2od*>(pu->object);
00141                     if (p2) {
00142                         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("%.2f %.2f %.2f�", p2->x, p2->y, p2->theta);
00143                     }*/
00144                     repository->setObject(pu->completeUrl, pu->object->clone());
00145                     repository->wakeUpListeningSessions(pu->completeUrl,
00146                         new EventPropertyUpdateValue(pu->completeUrl));
00147                     RImage* img = dynamic_cast<RImage*>(pu->object);
00148 /*                  if (img) {
00149                         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Received an image of %zu x %zu pixels", img->getWidth(), img->getHeight());
00150                         RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Pixel (0,0,0) value: %du", img->getBuffer()[0]);
00151                     }*/
00152                     // no remote stuff (do not call repository->valueChanged())
00153                 } break;
00154                 case RPropertyUpdate::DIFF: {
00155                     repository->lock(pu->completeUrl, HERE);
00156                     Property* p = repository->getRemoteProperty(pu->completeUrl, 0);
00157                     const ObjectDiff* diff = dynamic_cast<const ObjectDiff*>(pu->object);
00158                     if (diff) {
00159                         //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Diff class: %s", diff->objectClassName.c_str());
00160                         if (p->getObjectClassName() == "") p->setObjectClassName(diff->objectClassName);
00161                         RDK2::Object* obj = repository->getObjectOrCreateItL(pu->completeUrl);
00162                         obj->applyDiff(diff);
00163                         //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Diff applied");
00164                     }
00165                     else {
00166                         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("It wasn't an ObjectDiff (but a '%s')",
00167                             pu->object->getClassName().c_str());
00168                     }
00169                     repository->unlock(pu->completeUrl);
00170                     repository->pushDiffInDiffQueue(pu->completeUrl, (ObjectDiff*) diff->clone());
00171                     repository->wakeUpListeningSessions(pu->completeUrl,
00172                         new EventPropertyUpdateDiff(pu->completeUrl));
00173                     // no remote stuff (do not call repository->valueChanged())
00174                 } break;
00175                 case RPropertyUpdate::ENQUEUE: {
00176                     repository->queuePush(pu->completeUrl, pu->object->clone());
00177                 } break;
00178             }
00179         }
00180     }
00181 }
00182 
00183 void RemotePropertyManager::manageSubscriptionMessage(const RNetMessage* msg) throw (SessionException)
00184 {
00185     const RRemoteSubscription* remsub = dynamic_cast<const RRemoteSubscription*>(msg->getPayload());
00186     if (!remsub) {
00187         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("There wasn't a remote subscription in the message "
00188             "(class: '%s')", msg->getPayload()->getClassName().c_str());
00189     }
00190     else {
00191         RRemoteSubscription* sub = (RRemoteSubscription*) remsub->clone();
00192         if (msg->getSender() == remsub->completeUrl.getHost()) {
00193             // the sender is sending a subscription for his own property:
00194             // this is an answer to an incomplete subscription
00195             DOUT("Managing answer to an incomplete subscription message for property '%s'",
00196                 remsub->completeUrl.c_str());
00197             repository->remoteSubscriptionRegister.completePropertyToReceiveSubscription(sub);
00198         }
00199         else {
00200             DOUT("Managing remote subscription message for property '%s'", remsub->completeUrl.c_str());
00201 
00202             // send immediately the current object if VALUE+ON_CHANGE
00203             // or the object on which the diff have to be applied if UPDATES+ON_CHANGE
00204             bool reallyAdded = repository->remoteSubscriptionRegister.addPropertyToSendSubscription(sub);
00205             if (reallyAdded) {
00206                 if (sub->when == RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE) {
00207                     repository->sendStorageValueToHost(sub->completeUrl, sub->askingHost, sub->socketType);
00208                 }
00209             }
00210         }
00211     }
00212 }
00213 
00214 // greatest commond divisor (FIXME move this elsewhere)
00215 int gcd(int n, int m)
00216 {
00217     if (n == m) return n;
00218     else {
00219         int nave, k;
00220         while (n != m) {
00221             if (n > m) {
00222                 nave = m;
00223                 m = n;
00224                 n = nave;
00225             }
00226             k = m - n;
00227             m = n;
00228             n = k;
00229             if (n == m) {
00230                 k = n;
00231                 return k;
00232             }
00233         }
00234     }
00235     return 0;   // FIXME?
00236 }

00238 void RemotePropertyManager::periodicSender()
00239 {
00240     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("Property updates periodic sender started");
00241 
00242     periodicSenderSession = repository->createSession("propertyPeriodicSender",
00243         "Property updates periodic sender session", "/");
00244     Session* session = periodicSenderSession;   // just a shortcut
00245 
00246     while (!exiting) {
00247         SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00248             RemoteSubscriptionRegister* reg = &(repository->remoteSubscriptionRegister);
00249 
00250             // delete old udp subscription not renewed
00251             double timeoutMs = session->getDouble(PROPERTY_UDP_RENEWAL_TIMEOUT);
00252             struct timeval tvnow;
00253             gettimeofday(&tvnow, 0);
00254             double nowMs = tvnow.tv_sec * 1000 + tvnow.tv_usec / 1000;
00255             vector<RRemoteSubscription> psendSub = reg->queryForPropertiesToSend("", "", Network::UDP_IP,
00256                 RRemoteSubscription::WHAT_ANY, RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_ANY);
00257             for (vector<RRemoteSubscription>::iterator it = psendSub.begin(); it != psendSub.end(); ++it) {
00258                 double timestampMs = it->timestamp.tv_sec * 1000 + it->timestamp.tv_usec / 1000;
00259                 if (nowMs - timestampMs > timeoutMs) {
00260                     DOUT("Subscription [%s] has reached timeout, removing",
00261                         it->getStringForVisualization().c_str());
00262                     reg->deleteSubscriptionToSend(it->id);
00263                 }
00264             }
00265 
00266             // send periodic storage values
00267             repository->sendStorageValuesToRemoteValueSubscribers("", "", Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY,
00268                 RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_VALUE, RRemoteSubscription::PERIODIC);
00269 
00270             // send packed storage updates
00271             psendSub = reg->queryForPropertiesToSend("", "", Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY,
00272                 RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_DIFFS, RRemoteSubscription::PERIODIC);
00273             for (vector<RRemoteSubscription>::iterator it = psendSub.begin(); it != psendSub.end(); ++it) {
00274                 DOUT("Sending storage updates packed for property '%s' to '%s'",
00275                     it->completeUrl.c_str(), it->askingHost.c_str());
00276                 // FIXME we should merge the diffs
00277                 //session->queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX, ??);  // FIXME who has the diffs?
00278             }
00279         SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00280         usleep(100 * 1000); // FIXME
00281     }
00282 
00283     delete session;
00284 }
00285 
00286 void RemotePropertyManager::periodicUdpRenewal()
00287 {
00288     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("Property upd subscriptions renewal started");
00289 
00290     periodicUdpRenewalSession = repository->createSession("propertyUdpRenewer",
00291         "Property updates UDP renewal session", "/");
00292     Session* session = periodicUdpRenewalSession;   // just a shortcut
00293 
00294     while (!exiting) {
00295         double interval = 1000.;    // XXX
00296         SESSION_TRY_START(session)
00297             RemoteSubscriptionRegister* reg = &(repository->remoteSubscriptionRegister);
00298             vector<RRemoteSubscription> subToRenew = reg->queryForPropertiesToReceive("", "", Network::UDP_IP,
00299                 RRemoteSubscription::WHAT_ANY, RRemoteSubscription::WHEN_ANY);
00300             for (vector<RRemoteSubscription>::iterator it = subToRenew.begin(); it != subToRenew.end(); ++it) {
00301                 DOUT("Remotely refreshing udp subscription for property '%s' to '%s'",
00302                     it->completeUrl.c_str(), it->completeUrl.getHost().c_str());
00303                 session->queuePush(PROPERTY_OUTBOX,
00304                     new RNetMessage(it->completeUrl.getHost(), session->getRepositoryName(),
00305                     RNetMessage::PROPERTY_SUBSCRIPTION, Network::UDP_IP, it->clone()));
00306             }
00307             interval = session->getDouble(PROPERTY_UDP_RENEWAL_INTERVAL);
00308         SESSION_END_CATCH_TERMINATE(session)
00309         usleep((int) interval * 1000);
00310     }
00311 
00312     delete session;
00313 }
00314 
00315 RemotePropertyManager::~RemotePropertyManager()
00316 {
00317     exiting = true;
00318     receiverSession->wakeUp();
00319     periodicSenderSession->wakeUp();
00320     periodicUdpRenewalSession->wakeUp();
00321     pthread_join(receiverThreadId, 0);
00322     pthread_join(periodicSenderThreadId, 0);
00323     pthread_join(periodicUdpRenewalThreadId, 0);
00324     RDK_INFO_PRINTF("Remote property manager closed");
00325 }
